resources.string: Your access token is not linked with this application.
You must provide a client object.
This application is not approved by Ayla Networks.
Could not find this application for sign-up!
You are forbidden to perform this operation
An unexpected error. Please try again later.
You need to sign in or sign up before continuing.
You have to confirm your account before continuing.
Your session expired, please sign in again to continue.
Your account was not activated yet.
Your account has not been approved by an administrator yet .
The email address has not signed up for an account .
No devices were found.\n\nPush \"Scan for Devices\" to retry or \"Register\" to find devices already connected to the WiFi network
Password must be at least 6 characters
The password you entered does not match the confirmed password entry

Hello [[user_name]]!

[[property_name]] is now [[property_value]] on your device [[device_product_name]] [[user_message]] Ayla Networks
Sign up successful. Check for a confirmation email to activate your account.
There was an error during sign-up
Are you sure you want to remove this device from your account?
Unregister device has still not completed successfully.
Are you sure you want to factory reset this device? All settings will be lost, and the device will be removed from your account.
Busy performing factory reset on device
The device has been factory reset
Factory Reset device has still not completed successfully.
Please make sure that the orange LED on the device is on. \n\nAlso make sure your device and phone use the same wireless connection to connect to the Internet.
Please make sure that the orange LED on the device is on. \n\nThen push the registration button on your device, and tap the REGISTER button below within 2 minutes.

Plug in your device or add batteries and tap \"Scan Devices\" below.\nThen hold the magnetic wand against the pairing icon on your device until the light stops flashing.\nYour device should appear in the list below momentarily. Once it does, select it, and tap on \"Register\".
Please make sure that the orange LED on the device is on.
Could not register the device. Make sure the device is ready for registration.
WiFi must be enabled to set up a new device
Tap SCAN FOR DEVICES to start
Establishing connection to the device. Please wait...
Scanning for available WiFi Access Points. Please wait...
Could not connect to the device at this time. Please reset the device and try again.
Select the WiFi network the new device should connect to
Please select the WiFi access point you wish your device to connect to and enter the WiFI password, if necessary.
Bad WiFi password. Please try again.
Connecting to the WiFi network. Please wait...
An unknown error occurred while signing in
No connectivity to WiFi or the cloud. Please check your network connection.
Once your email changed, you have to sigin with the new email.
Updating current profile information. Please wait...
An error occurred while trying to update your profile. Please try again later.
An error occurred while trying to update your email. Please try again later.
Your profile has been successfully updated.
The URL could not be opened
Please sign out before confirming a new account
Your account has been activated. Please log in.
Failed to confirm your new account.
Input the name for your new group or room
Select which devices you wish to have in this group
Please enter the email address associated with your account. If your account is valid, a new confirmation will be sent to you.
A confirmation email was sent to your account. Please check your email and click on the link provided to authenticate your account.
The group name you have chosen is reserved. Please choose another name for your group.
Do you wish to remove the group \"%s\"?
Enter your email address associated with your Ayla account. You will be sent an email with a link to reset your password.
An email has been sent with instructions to reset your password.
Enter your new password in the fields below. Make sure to type the same password in both fields.
Your password has been successfully changed. Please log in using your new password.
Do you really wish to delete your account? This action cannot be undone
Your account has successfully been deleted.
Send a push notification to this device

You can be notified when your devices go online or offline. Check all of your preferred notification methods below. Note that for push notifications, each mobile device will need to be updated individually to enable or disable push notifictions to that particular device.
The device has been registered, but could not update notifications. Please check notifications in Settings.
Updating the scheudle for this device. Please wait...
Automatically turn your device on and off using the schedule settings below.
Select the days you want the schedule to be active below:
An error occurred while trying to update the schedule for this device. Please try again later.
Select which action you would like to update with this schedule:
Please select at least one action to update with this schedule
Configure a timer or a schedule before saving.
Update Turn on and Turn off time for this schedule.
Select the time zone for this device
Fetching the current timezone for your device from the server. Please wait...
Updating the time zone for your device. Please wait...
The timezone for this device was updated successfully
An error occurred while trying to update the time zone for this device
An error occurred while trying to get the current timezone for this device. Please try again later.
Updating your list of contacts. Please wait...
A phone number or email address is required
An unknown error occurred while trying to update the information for this contact. Please try again later.
Sending contact information to the server. Please wait...
Are you sure you want to remove \"%s\" from your contact list?
Removing the contact from your list. Please wait...
Enter the password for the \"%s\" access point
Devices I am sharing with others
Updating your list of shares from the server. Please wait...
Are you sure you want to stop sharing \"%1$s\" with %2$s?
Removing the share from the server. Please wait...

Are you sure you want to remove \"%1$s\" from your device list?
This device was shared with you by %2$s.
Are you sure you want to remove this shared device from your account?
Enter the email address of the Ayla user you would like to share this device with:
Enter the role to use when sharing this device
The share has been set up successfully.
An unknown error occurred when trying to set up this share. Please make sure the email address entered is owned by an existing Ayla account holder.
Enter the email address of the Ayla account holder you would like to share devices with. Then check each device you would like to share, and tap the OK button.
Creating the shares for the selected devices. Please wait...
An unknown error occurred while trying to delete this share. Please try again later.
An unknown error occurred while trying to fetch shared devices. Please try again later.
An unknown error occurred while trying to create a share. Please try again later.
There are no devices that can be shared registered to this account.
The shared device has been removed from your account.
An unknown error occurred while trying to remove this shared device from your account.
You are currently operating in Offline Mode. Functionality may be very limited until Internet connectivity is restored.
Allow this user to control your device
Enter the email address of the Ayla account holder you wish to share with
Please enter the email address of the Ayla account holder you would like to share with
Enter the name for your device below:
An error occurred while trying to change the name of your device. Please try again later.
Do you wish to sign out %s?
Tap the add button to create a new group
Tap the add button to add devices to this group
Device is offline and cannot be modified
Fetching devices from the cloud. Please wait...
Confirming connection to the cloud service. Please wait...
Registering the new device with your account. Please wait...
Tap the device you would like to set up, or cancel
Check the device(s) you would like to set up, or cancel
Device failed to connect with the service. Attempting to connect to the device...
The device failed to connect with the service.
Device failed to connect with the service. Attempting to reconnect to the device...
Fetching account information from the server. Please wait...
This contact cannot receive SMS messages
This contact cannot receive email notifications
Send push notification to this device
Property notifications are not available on this device
Fetching notifications for this device. Please wait...
No notifications exist for this device. Tap the add button to create one.
Please select at least one contact to be notified via email or SMS
Please choose a value to compare with
Please choose a name for your notification
Do you want to remove the notification \"%s\"?
Enable GPS in Android Settings to improve device location accuracy
No candidate was found to register
No gateway found. Please register one first.
Further setup for this device will occur in the background. The sensor may not respond immediately for the next couple of minutes.
An error occurred while scanning for devices
An error occurred while connecting to the device
An error occurred while connecting the device to the WiFi network
An error occurred while fetching device registration candidates
An error occurred while registering the device candidate
An error occurred while confirming the device connection
Are you sure you want to pair to remote?
Are you sure you want to unpair from remote?
Issue found with device setup. Make sure device has good batteries and is active, then press the Fix button.
Issue found with device setup. Factory reset the device and then Add Device again.
Input the name for your new scene
Tap the add button to add devices to this scene
Tap the add button to create a new scene
Select which devices you wish to have in this scene
Create Scene completed with failed nodes
Update Scene completed with failed nodes
Select the devices that you want in the scene. Set up the devices in the state that you want the scene set.
Set up the devices in the state that you want the scene set. Select the devices that you want in the scene. All devices must be attached to the same gateway.
Do you wish to remove the scene \"%s\"?
No devices found. Try restarting the device and scan again
Click here to set\n up gateway

Plug your gateway into a power outlet using the included AC adapter.\n\nConnect one end of the included network cable to the gateway\'s Ethernet port and the other end to a LAN port on your WiFi Router.
The gateway\'s Cloud LED should be blinking slowly, indicating that is ready to be registered.
If you don\'t see this, please go back and review again the power cable is connected, the network cable is also connected and the WiFi is working.
Push the "Reg" button on the back of the gateway.
The cloud LED on the front should now be blinking faster.
Push the "Reg" button on the device, and then press "OK".
Fingerprint Authentication failed too many times. Please reenter application credentials
There is no existing fingerPrint for this Device.Please go to Android Settings and add a new fingerprint.
When enabled, the application will always request credentials when the application is launched." If disabled, your credentials will be securely saved and automatically applied on product launch.
Enabling geofencing allows geofencing to be configured an operate as expected. Disabling geofencing will leave any existing configuration in place, but the geofencing feature will not work.
Adding geofences that were registered from other Mobile devices. Please wait...
Contacts access permission granted. You can now add contacts
Contacts access permission denied. You cannot add contacts
Location permission granted. You can scan for devices now
Location permission denied. You cannot scan for devices
Please enter valid data for all fields
Are you sure to delete this AMAP Geofence?
You have no automations associated with your account. Tap on the add button to create one.
Are you sure you want to remove this Automation?
Are you sure you want to remove this Action?
This automation has no actions. Tap on the add button to associate one.
Are you sure to delete this Automation?
There was an error. Please try again.
Location permission denied.This permission is required for Geofences
Location permission is required for Geofence.
Do you wish to enable all existing automations in this phone?
Please enter Beacon Name for the selected Beacon.
Are you sure to delete this Beacon?
Please enable bluetooth in settings and try again.
Sorry, this device does not support Bluetooth LE
No new Beacons found. Would you like to scan for Beacons again?
Please enter new Beacon Name for the selected Beacon.
